title: Marinate the Mutton
description: Add the cleaned mutton to the marinade. Mix thoroughly until the mutton is evenly coated. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight for best flavor.

title: Rest and Serve
description: Turn off the heat and let the biryani rest for 10 minutes. Gently mix before serving to retain the long grains. Serve hot with raita or Kashmiri chutney.
